p.k: The 2018 Mercedes-Benz Virtual GP championship enters its third and final part of the season. After amazing races with GT3 cars and historic prototypes C9 it's time to go to single-seaters, Formula Hybrid 2017, original cars based on Formula 1's 2017 technical regulations, made by Race Sim Studio. And to make it even better, Virtual GP heads to the legendary circuit at Silverstone. Can Michal Šmídl (Predator) finally win the championship title? As always, with Justin Sutton (FakeGhostPirate) and Chris Buxton (KingKodiak) in the commentary box.
